text: Mona Lisa Smile is a 2003 American romantic drama movie. It is set in 1953 in Massachusetts. Julia Roberts plays Katherine. Julia Stiles plays Joan. Kirsten Dunst plays Elizabeth. Marcia Gay Harden plays Nancy. Maggie Gyllenhaal plays Giselle. This movie got mixed to negative reviews from critics. It made a lot of money at the box office. Category:2003 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:Movies set in the 1950s
title: Mona Lisa Smile
